turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to get some Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What is the location of the store you want to get your order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks on 250 Vesey St #203 in New York City

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, and what kind of drink would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a Cinnamon Dolce Latte

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of miilk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 2% works

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And would you like whipped cream or honey?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whipped cream would be great

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So to confirm, you want a Cinnamon Dolce Latte, grande size, 2% milk, with whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like me to place the order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order has been placed

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You can pick up your order shortly

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Also, a receipt has been sent to your mobile device as a text message, have a good day!
